SEARCH
Package edu.escuelaing.arsw.controller

Class TableController

java.lang.Object
edu.escuelaing.arsw.controller.TableController
@RestController @CrossOrigin("*") @RequestMapping("/table") public class TableController extends Object
The TableController class is a REST controller that handles HTTP requests related to the game table and treasures. It provides endpoints for retrieving the game table, creating treasures, and retrieving treasures.

It is marked with the @RestController annotation to indicate that it is a Spring REST controller, and @CrossOrigin to allow cross-origin requests. The @RequestMapping annotation is used to specify the base path for all endpoints in this controller.

    • TableController

      @Autowired public TableController(TableService tableService)
      Constructs a TableController with the specified TableService.

      tableService - the service used to manage the game table and treasures

  • Method Details

    • getTable

      @GetMapping("") public Integer[][] getTable()
      Retrieves the current state of the game table.
      Returns:
      a 2D array representing the game table

    • createTreasures

      @GetMapping("/treasures") public void createTreasures()
      Creates treasures on the game table.

    • getTreasures

      @GetMapping("/treasures/get") public HashMap<String,Treasure> getTreasures()
      Retrieves all treasures on the game table.
      Returns:
      a HashMap containing the treasures, where the keys are the treasure IDs and the values are the Treasure objects
